itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Colin Kaepernick nixing Nike's American flag shoe release, Kawhi Leonard holding the NBA hostage, Megan Rapinoe saying she wouldn't go to the White House if the US Women's soccer team wins the World Cup, Kevin Dura...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Colin Kaepernick nixing Nike's American flag shoe release, Kawhi Leonard holding the NBA hostage, Megan Rapinoe saying she wouldn't go to the White House if the US Women's soccer team wins the World Cup, Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving signing with the Nets, and why Tiger Woods isn't playing any warmups before majors.
